short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract vocabulary, text, and definitions straight to Google Sheets to study anything as flashcards while browsing the web.

Flashcard Lab easily copies vocabulary, text and definitions from websites into Google Sheetsâ„¢ in order to make flashcards as you are browsing the web. It also automatically grabs the definition for you from dictionary.com, all for free!

First, create a new Google Sheetsâ„¢ spreadsheet (or select an existing one) from the Flashcard Lab Extension options page. Select any text from a webpage, right click and click "Save to spreadsheet". That's it!
